item.title: Government Promotes Oil Palm Farming for Prosperity in Beechupalli
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: A program about oil palm farming took place at the TG Oilfed Nursery in Beechupalli. The event was organized by the Horticulture Department and TG Oilfed for officials from the Panchayat Raj and Rural Development departments, such as Assistant Project Officers, Engineering Consultants, and Panchayat Secretaries.
The program aimed to ensure different departments work together to meet the district’s oil palm farming goals. District Horticulture Officer M.A. Akbar and TG O...]]>

item.title: Mana Mudiraj Mahasabha appoints new State Secy
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: JalagariAshok, a lawyer hailing from Aiza town in Jogulamba Gadwal district, has been appointed as the State Secretary of the Mana Mudiraj Mahasabha.
The official appointment was made during a meeting at the Mahasabha’s State Office, where State President Dr Chappari Shankara Mudiraj handed over the appointment letter.
Expressing his gratitude, Ashok thanked the State President and all the committee members for entrusting him with the important responsibility. Speaking on the occasion,...]]>
item.author: The Hans India

item.title: Jalagari Ashok from Aiza named State Secretary of Mana Mudiraj Mahasabha
item.description:
<![CDATA[-Advertisement-
Gadwal: Jalagari Ashok, a lawyer from Aiza town in the Jogulamba Gadwal district, has been named the State Secretary of the Mana Mudiraj Mahasabha. This announcement was made during a meeting at the Mahasabha’s State Office. Dr. Chappari Shankara Mudiraj, the State President, personally gave Ashok his appointment letter.
Ashok expressed his thanks to the State President and committee members for their trust. He committed to working hard for the Mudiraj community’s welfare and g...]]>
